Class ReservationsDao

java.lang.Object
managerpro.Model.ReservationsDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
IReservationsDao
public class ReservationsDao
extends java.lang.Object
implements IReservationsDao
Data Access Object for performing CRUD on Reservations table and returning ReservationsEntity -objects when applicable. PortionsEntity
